settings.text:
We are committed to understanding your unique style and preferences, crafting spaces that mirror your personality and lifestyle. From inception to completion, we walk alongside you through each phase of the design journey, ensuring a smooth and stress-free process.

What you can expect

Our design services grant you access to a wealth of expertise in material and design selection, guaranteeing that every aspect of your interior resonates harmoniously. Whether you gravitate towards the timeless allure of wood, the contemporary edge of metal, or the plush comfort of upholstery, we assist you in navigating through a diverse range of options to discover materials that align with your aesthetic vision.

Furniture Selection - in person and virtual

Recognizing that furniture serves as the centerpiece of any interior, we provide personalized guidance in choosing the ideal pieces from our extensive collection. Whether you seek a standout sofa, a snug armchair, or a practical dining set, our design specialists are on hand to steer you toward selections that seamlessly integrate with your design concept and elevate the functionality of your space.

Moreover, for those from out of town, we offer the convenience of virtual tours to aid in furniture selection, ensuring that distance is no barrier to achieving your design goals.

We firmly believe that exceptional design transcends mere aesthetics – it's about crafting spaces that inspire, invigorate, and enrich your daily experiences. Discover the transformative potential of outstanding design with our comprehensive home design assistance, and allow us to turn your vision into a tangible reality – all with the assurance of a complimentary initial meeting, free of charge.

How it works

Step 1: Initial meeting

We will arrange a call to chat about your schedule, goals, budget, and to understand your individual style. Once we've connected, we'll proceed to the next stage.

Step 2: In-Home Meeting (Or virtual if you are outside of London, Ontario)

A design specialist will coordinate a complimentary in-home consultation. Throughout this session, we'll take measurements, explore your style preferences, and initiate the development of your design package.

Step 3: Design Package

According to your specifications, we'll offer design packages featuring a range of options. These may encompass ready-to-ship furniture and lighting packages, paint colors, material selections, and floor plans. Additional fees may apply based on the specific services needed for your project's scope.

How to Prepare for Initial Meeting

  • Create a categorized list of questions for each room. 
  • Take a solo walkthrough of your home to pinpoint desired changes. 
  • Highlight elements you love and wish to retain in your home; this helps us grasp your taste and requirements. 
  • Visualize the purpose of each space in your home. 
  • Consider a rough budget outline, focusing on your spending aspirations.

How do I get started?

Contact us here. We will respond next business day to all inquiries.
